  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy taken in in chemical reactions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie genommen innen in den chemischen 
Reaktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie prise dedans dans des réactions 
chimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia feita exame dentro em reações 
químicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia presa dentro nelle reazioni chimiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που κερδίζεται στις χημικές αντιδράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía tomada adentro en reacciones químicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that energy is taken in when a compound is broken down into its constituent substances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">splitting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Energie innen 
genommen wird, wenn ein Mittel unterbrochener Abstieg in seine 
konstituierenden Substanzen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que de l'énergie est 
prise dedans quand un composé est décomposé en ses substances 
constitutives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia está 
feita exame dentro quando um composto é pena quebrada em suas 
substâncias constituent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia è 
presa dentro quando un residuo è analizzato nelle relative sostanze 
costituenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενέργεια κερδίζεται 
όταν χωρίζεται μια ένωση σε τις ιδρυτικές ουσίες της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía está 
tomada adentro cuando un compuesto se analiza en sus sustancias 
constitutivas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindungsaufspaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">se dédoubler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rachar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spaccare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική αντίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
